Author: ethanalexanderthird
Text: My sub use to get this occasionally. Would often intensely crave ice cream and high sugar foods, light headed and dizzy a lot.  Eventually was fixed when I began controlling her intake of food.  It's possible to lose excessive weight or maintain low weight without a lot of the side effects you read about on here if you strictly control what types of food your having whenever you do eat, and better leveraging exercise to create a calorie deficit instead just calorie intake.
